meta.name: Web3 DeFi
meta.description: DeFi专业风格，绿色收益配色，适合投资分析、收益追踪

base.container: background-color: #0d1421; color: #e2e8f0; font-family: 'Inter', system-ui, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.7; padding: 20px;

header_window.style: background-color: #111827; border: 1px solid #22c55e; border-radius: 8px 8px 0 0; padding: 12px 20px; margin-bottom: 20px;
header_window.title_style: color: #22c55e; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 600; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px;

headings.h2: color: #22c55e; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; margin: 24px 0 14px; display: flex; align-items: center;
headings.h3: color: #4ade80; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 600; margin: 18px 0 10px; padding-left: 12px; border-left: 3px solid #22c55e;
headings.h1: color: #22c55e; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; margin: 24px 0 14px; display: flex; align-items: center;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #14532d; color: #4ade80; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 3px; font-family: monospace; font-size: 90%;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #111827; color: #22c55e; padding: 16px; border-radius: 6px; margin: 16px 0; font-size: 12px; border: 1px solid #374151;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #14532d; border-left: 3px solid #22c55e; color: #86efac; padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #450a0a; border-left: 3px solid #ef4444; color: #fca5a5; padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #111827; border: 1px dashed #22c55e50; color: #22c55e; padding: 20px; text-align: center; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 6px; font-size: 12px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 32px; padding: 16px; background-color: #111827; border-radius: 8px; text-align: center; border: 1px solid #1f2937;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
